definition: a sure catch/sth one is sure to obtain

sentences.english: Is Federer at least safe at No. 2?
sentences.chinese: 費德勒至少是穩獲年終第二了吧？

sentences.english: Stats do not concede us to be certain of the Scudetto.
sentences.chinese: 數據並沒有顯示我們已經穩獲冠軍。

sentences.english: From what we have known, you are sure to win first place in this comprehensive exam.
sentences.chinese: 已知的情況看，這次綜合考試你穩獲第一。

sentences.english: After that, I knew he was home free for the nomination.
sentences.chinese: 這之後，我就知道，他穩獲提名了。

sentences.english: Why don't you try on the clothes and see if they fit?
sentences.chinese: 從已知的情況看，這次綜合考試你穩獲第一。
